headline: Ask HN: Non-Traditional Equity Grants?
description:
We're trying to settle a bet here at the Rutter (YC S19) office.

Is anyone aware of a startup that granted equity to a dog?

We're trying to find out if there ever has been a company which granted more equity to a dog than a full time employee at some point in time; this is a hard question to Google.

PS: we're hiring! https://rutterapi.notion.site/Rutter-is-hiring-173edb891d5548fba527a38d00fa8193
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 非传统的股权赠与？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 非傳統的股權贈與？
description_zh-Hans:
我们正在努力解决鲁特（YC S19）办公室的一个赌注。

有谁知道有一家初创公司向狗授予股权？

我们正在努力寻找是否曾经有一家公司在某个时间点向狗授予了比全职员工更多的股权；这是个难以谷歌的问题。

PS：我们正在招聘！https://rutterapi.notion.site/Rutter-is-hiring-173edb891d5548fba527a38d00fa8193。
description_zh-Hant:
我們正在努力解決魯特（YC S19）辦公室的一個賭注。

有誰知道有一家初創公司向狗授予股權？

我們正在努力尋找是否曾經有一家公司在某個時間點向狗授予了比全職員工更多的股權；這是個難以谷歌的問題。

PS：我們正在招聘！https://rutterapi.notion.site/Rutter-is-hiring-173edb891d5548fba527a38d00fa8193。
